Posts.Content: grandmaadams wrote: Hello all. My last radiation treatment was 10/31/2018. Almost 6 months later my skin is all healed and everything looks good. My breast still feels heavy, no more shooting pains but still some throbbing. Just wondering if anyone else is experiencing this months after finishing or am I just overly aware of my breast and a little hyperfocusing?Â  Log in to post a reply
